column4: - looks interersting - I really wish I could remember which distro I used about 3/4 years ago, when I had no MS OS for a while. I'm determined to dump xp/vita
find otu exactly what kind of card it is, and figure out which kernel module is being used for it, then do sudo rmmod <module>
well, lsmod will give you a list of currently loaded modules, lsmod | grep snd      should narrow it down quite a bit
